titleStmt.title: The Romish priest turn'd protestant with the reasons of his conversion, wherin the true Church is exposed to the view of Christians and derived out of the Holy Scriptures, sound reason, and the ancient fathers : humbly presented to both houses of Parliament / by James Salago.
titleStmt.author: Salgado, James, fl. 1680.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
